title: Lore hints we need more Darkin champs.
body:
We have only 3 Darkin.

We know from lore that Dsrkins are Ascended Shurimans that fought the void who went out of control after azir's death.

We should have at least 2 more Darkin champs made to allow a full Darkin team.

Possible Darkin weapons:
Katana
Whip
Bladed Boomerang
Darkin Gunblade

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Post Mordem,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YUmALvAO,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-08-16T13:01:35.962+0000)
>
>Possible Darkin weapons:
> Katana
> Whip
> Bladed Boomerang
> Darkin Gunblade

I don't think a Katana or a Gunblade would make much sense, they're Shuriman, not Ionian, and guns didn't even exist in their time, much less gunblades. Some other fun options could be a Darkin Lance for the support, some engage-tank who's forgiven Targon for the imprisonment of the Darkin now seeks to live peacefully among the mortals like they once did. As for the midlane Darkin I'm less sure, since it's hard to come up with a good weapon for a mage.

Whoever said they had to be trapped in their weapon? Were all Ascended great warriors who specialised in some form of weapon? Seems a weird requirement.

One concept I have is a Darkin who is basically trapped in a large stick because it was near them at the time as they were a mage, no weapon needed. No 'weapon' to trap so people tricked them into picking up a stick and were trapped in that. (Of course the concept is a meat shield bruiser support with healing based on the host).

> Through secrecy and cunning artifice, the physical forms of the Ascended could be merged with the celestial power in their hearts, and all of it bound within the weapons they bore.

They are imprisoned in their own weapon.

And tbh, I would expect the strongest ones to wield weapons. I mean... Staff of Office was promotion to Azir from his ascension. It came with his ascension.

So Azir has one, kinda odd it just appeared but what if they didn't have one in their Ascension? What if they weren't a warrior? Just a person so respected and revered in Shurima they were given ascension due to their importance? Like an inventor, politician or merchant? What if their Ascended form wasn't as human like as others and couldn't hold a weapon?

If their powers weren't meant for combat, why would you imprison them in the first place? They are imprisoned to slain the other darkins, and these darkins needed to be among the strongest.

I don't expect Shabaka and Shabake to wield weapons since they were seers but Cebotaru likely had.

Nasus was a scholar and a general. He wasn't trained in combat primarily, but now, he is a terrible foe with his battle axe. Ascension can change your abilities.

I assume all Ascended were anthropomorphic. Even if they weren't, they probably would have limbs to wield a weapon, like I don't know, tentacles?

What about magic-weilding Darkins? If you ask me magic is usually a far better combat tool in general. So, how would they imprison a more magic-oriented Darkin?
If you ask me, I think that even those Darkins/Ascended had a weapon of some sorts. Maybe an artefact-weapon like a gauntlet with Horok's case, or a staff or some other thing like that

Maybe a staff for a mage. Or, since some people like the idea of the Darkin using the weapons of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, they could do something odd and make it a set of scales. Then he/she could have a joke about game balance.

Why am I getting downvoted? Jinx doesn't even get skins anymore, it's been like a whole week. Just embrace that Fishbones is the good guy darkin and jinx is a bad person, embrace it.

It would be nice for Riot to finally release all 5, but apart from Varus' sister, it might be impossible to ever get all 5. With how much has happened in Runeterra, having the last Darkin not being trapped in the Shadow Isles from when they where the Blessed Isles, just falling into a Voidborn-Ridden cave where no one would ever find them or just in the depths of the sea, where only the likes of Voidborns, Nautilus or something way worse steps is quite likely

And this is where a Mage Darkin comes in. It's a Darkin, but so corrupted by the Void the use AP alongside thier weapon, which is how I envisioned the Katana Darkin.

The Void energy is black flames. The champs passive is that they have no AD, but each AA does scaling percent hp with level.

Q: Something similar to Kassadins e, but with black flames, and slows the target. 

W: AoE DoT that steals hp back with each tick. Has long ass CD.

E: A shield made of Void energy, costs 20%hp to use, sheilds for double that at max rank.

R: Channels for a Rift opening/black hole, dealing percent missing hp damage. Heals for %damage dealt.

>Katana

It's OK. You can admit you want Vergil in the game. I, at least, won't judge you.
